eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Boulder, CO; AT 08:47 AM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:47 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Emergency officials have issued an Update to the Evacuation order at 09:47:33 on 10-09-2025The evacuation order in the area of Caribou Village Shopping Center has been lifted. Click www.BOCO911Alert.org for a map of the affected area and detailed information.
